channel.title: Exception encountered while trying to wear something
channel.description:
Okay this might sound stupid, i was messing with my stuff cleaning blabla, and i saw the boolean wear and then i said, i'll move it to wearing.java l0l and then when i moved it it would throw me an exception so i moved it back to the client and then it's throwing me the same excp..[code=java]xception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Mr boogie. java.lang.NullPointerException at server.oblivion2.player.Special.needSpecial(Special.java:136) at server.oblivion2.player.Client.wear(Client.java:2605) at server.oblivion2.player.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:5438) at server.oblivion2.player.Client.packetProcess(Client.java:9889) at server.oblivion2.player.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:275) at server.Server$1.execute(Server.java:193) at server.task.Task.tick(Task.java:102) at server.task.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:97) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$101(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.runPeriodic(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Special java 136 [code=java] c.removeSpec(12323);[/code] at server.oblivion2.player.Client.wear(Client.java:2605) [code=java] Special.needSpecial(wearID, targetSlot);[/code] at server.oblivion2.player.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:5438) [code=java]at server.oblivion2.player.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:5438)[/code]

@strucker wrote:

But i don’t know why it’s null, because i got it back just the way it was.

item.title: Exception encountered while trying to wear something
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

any money you aren’t setting the fields properly like I told you to do. That’s why the Client declaration is null and therefore throwing a nullpointerexception.
